DOC.brief_summary: To explore prevalence genetic polymorphism RNF213 rs112735431 gene non-cardioembolic ischemic cerebrovascular disease Thai patient .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Genetic Polymporphism RNF213 rs112735431 Gene Non-cardioemboli Ischemic Cerebrovascular Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional observational study Chulalongkorn hospital , determine prevalence genetic polymorphism RNF213 rs112735431 gene non-cardioembolic ischemic cerebrovascular disease . Patients potentially eligible study participation identify chart review patient admit Chulalongkorn Hospital acute ischemic stroke treatment .
DOC.criteria: Nationality Thailand Age equal 18 year Clinical image diagnosis acute ischemic stroke Patient consent participate research High risk cardioembolic stroke TOAST classification Contraindication venipuncture Pregnancy breast feed patient History head neck radiation Down 's syndrome Marfan syndrome Autoimmune disease SLE Ongoing malignancy remission malignancy less 1year
